text: Skazhite vy: "My veruyem v Allakha, I v Otkroveniye, nisposlannoye nam, I Ibrakhimu, Ismailu, Iskhaku i Yakubu, I vsem dvenadtsati israil'skim kolenam; I v to, chto Muse (Bog) poslal, I v to, chto daroval On Ise I chto drugim prorokam snizoshlo, - Mezh nimi my ne delayem razlichiy, I lish' Yemu my vsey dushoy predalis'
